model.elements

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.elements.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Axis-aligned rectangle in a plane, defined by its top-left point and two dimensions (width and height) in pixels.
    Author:
    geomaster
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • equalRectangle

        public boolean equalRectangle(Rectangle other)
        Tests if the rectangle is the same as another rectangle.
        Parameters:
        other - Rectangle to test
        Returns:
        true if the rectangles are the same, false if not

      • normalize

        public void normalize()
        Normalizes the rectangle, i.e. transforms it so that it geometrically describes the same rectangle while ensuring that the width and height are positive.
